sqlMessage: In aggregated query without GROUP BY, expression #1 of SELECT list contains nonaggregated column 'ds_public.ds_table.did'; this is incompatible with sql_mode=only_full_group_by
sql:
select ds_table.did as ds_table_did,ds_table.ds_key as ds_table_ds_key,ds_table.ds_name as ds_table_ds_name,ds_table.ds_type as ds_table_ds_type,ds_table.ds_dec as ds_table_ds_dec,ds_table.ds_update_time as ds_table_ds_update_time,ds_table.ds_create_time as ds_table_ds_create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table_field.did) as ds_table_field_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table_field.ds_left_did) as ds_table_field_ds_left_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table_field.ds_right_did) as ds_table_field_ds_right_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table_field.ds_update_time) as ds_table_field_ds_update_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table_field.ds_create_time) as ds_table_field_ds_create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table_field.ds_field_type) as ds_table_field_ds_field_type, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table_field.ds_right_field_id) as ds_table_field_ds_right_field_id, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table_field.ds_left_field_id) as ds_table_field_ds_left_field_id
                                    from ds_table
                                    left join ds_table_field on ds_table_field.ds_left_did=ds_table.did  left join ds_field on ds_field.did=ds_table_field.ds_right_did
